mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (id, user_id, total_amount, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.total_amount, o.status, o.created_at, i.id AS item_id, i.order_id, i.product_id, i.quantity, i.price FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN order_item i ON o.id = i.order_id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}

WITH paginated_orders AS ( SELECT id, user_id, total_amount, status, created_at FROM `order` WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{orderLimit} OFFSET #{orderOffset} ), order_items_paged AS ( SELECT oi.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY order_id ORDER BY id) AS rn FROM order_item oi WHERE oi.order_id IN (SELECT id FROM paginated_orders) ) SELECT po.id AS order_id, po.user_id, po.total_amount, po.status, po.created_at, oip.id AS item_id, oip.order_id, oip.product_id, oip.quantity, oip.price FROM paginated_orders po LEFT JOIN order_items_paged oip ON po.id = oip.order_id AND oip.rn > #{itemOffset} AND oip.rn <= #{itemOffset} + #{itemLimit} ORDER BY po.created_at DESC, oip.id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item (order_id, product_id, quantity, price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price})
